resources.string:
Navigate by pressing on the folders.
If you long press on an item, the options to Open or Rename it will come up if it is a folder, and the additional option to email the item will appear as well if it is a file, rather than a folder.
For Fire TV, navigate left, right, up and down using the directional arrows.
For Fire TV, simply long press the remote or controller to have the options appear.
For Fire TV, after pressing Rename, press again to make the keyboard appear.

Email me at jibrahim015@gmail.com if you have any other questions or issues. Always happy to help.
